Title: GNU Readline: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GNU Readline, the worst
    of which could result in a Denial of Service condition.

Background.Text: The GNU Readline library provides a set of functions for use by applications that allow users to edit command lines as they are typed in.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GNU Readline. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All GNU Readline users should upgrade to the latest version:
